oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two dimensional gravity water waves with constant vorticity: I. Cubic lifespan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ifrim, Mihaela
Tataru, Daniel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
35Q35, 42B37, 76B15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article is concerned with the incompressible, infinite depth water wave equation in two space dimensions, with gravity and constant vorticity but with no surface tension. We consider this problem expressed in position-velocity potential holomorphic coordinates, and prove local well-posedness for large data, as well as cubic lifespan bounds for small data solutions.
